name: The Pyrofrost (Noone)
description:
I was messing with the particle system in Game Maker Studio 2, and was using physics and movement inspired by Celeste, and decided to keep working on it. I may stop if i grow bored of it.

Note: I haven't added in any audio assets for the initial release, so the audio slider does nothing as of now.

If you notice any bugs, please inform me!
